attributes.action: More funding for mental health services and better understanding.
attributes.additional_details:
Suicide rates are the highest since 1981.  
85 million has been cut across the uk for mental health services in the past year alone. 
Mental health trusts in England have seen their budgets fall by more than 8% in real terms over the course of this parliament figures suggest. The reduction worth almost 600 million was revealed research by BBC News. 
Often vulnerable people are sent to a&e or police cells instead of recieving appropriate help.
attributes.background:
Invisible disability is just as important as physical disability. 
Recent cuts to mental health services has resulted in people not receiving the crucial help they need that saves lives. Vulnerable people are not recieving the medical help they require.
